biotools.summary:
Modeling drug mechanism of action with large scale gene-expression profiles using GPAR.

GPAR Genetic Profile-Activity Relationship.

GPAR provides drug repurposing and MOAs prediction services. Using gene expression profile data and Deep Learning, to build models, to make predictions.
